title: N-power to play greater role in India's energy mix: AEC chairman Ajit Mohanty
description: India plans to expand its nuclear power capacity over the next two decades to meet energy security and climate goals. The country is building new reactors, including 700-MWe PHWRs and a 500-MWe PFBR. Private players are also being involved in developing small modular reactors and new nuclear technologies.
